Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute at Madison/Springfield

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 61st/King Drive
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st  buses are rerouted via 59th, Cottage Grove, 60th, King Drive, 61st, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near 61st/King Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#59 59th/61st  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Cottage Grove, 60th, King Drive, 61st, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near 61st/King Drive.

Allow extra travel time.
